participant_1.background: i was raised in a single parent household. i only eat kosher. i am a stunt double as my second job. i never broke a bone in my body ever in my life.

participant_2.background: my favorite toy as a child as my lite brite. i take dance lessons once a week. i also like old school hip hop. i was born in the early 80 s. i love new kids on the block.

content.text: Hi! It is nice to see you! How is your day going? I like to be in the gym.
What is the name of the job for the child?
